org.risk.model

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.risk.model.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The Instance of this Class holds Map Object. I will also allow to add or remove functionalities on Map Object. It's responsible for the entire simulation flow.
    Author:
    Omer

                 boolean firstAnalysis)
                   throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

        Parameters:
        countryID - ID of own country
        firstAnalysis - true to show the first analysis of the turn. false to show reanalysis

        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - Exception about supporting clone

      • moveArmies

        public void moveArmies(java.util.ArrayList<State> defendingStates,
              java.util.ArrayList<State> supportingStates,
              int myCountryID)
        This method finds the state that have not attacked or will not defend, and moves 50% of their armies to states that need more armies
        Parameters:
        defendingStates - List of states which have attacked or will defend
        supportingStates - List of states which have not attacked or will not defend
        myCountryID - ID of own country

                        java.lang.InterruptedException

        Parameters:
        targetState - State that is going to be attacked
        attackingStates - States that are going to attack
        countryId - ID of attacking country
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - Required class for handling exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • battlePhase

        public void battlePhase(State targetState,
               java.util.ArrayList<State> attackingStates)
                 throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is used to Log the battle phase
        Parameters:
        targetState - defines the target state in the battle
        attackingStates - defines the attacking state in the battle
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - throws the clone not supported exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - throws the interrupted exception exception
